title: Blessings for Obedience, Curses for Disobedience
summary: Deuteronomy 28 powerfully contrasts the blessings for obeying God with the curses for turning away. Blessings include prosperity, protection, and honor. Curses include suffering, defeat, and exile.

faq.question: What kinds of blessings are promised for obedience?
faq.answer: Fertility, victory, abundance, and God's presence.

faq.question: What happens if Israel disobeys?
faq.answer: They will suffer disease, famine, foreign domination, and ultimately exile.
